price: Mola wangu Mlezi! Nijaalie niwe mwenye kushika Swala, na katika dhuriya zangu pia. Ewe Mola wetu Mlezi, na ipokee dua yangu.
arabic: رَبِّ ٱجۡعَلۡنِي مُقِيمَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةِ وَمِن ذُرِّيَّتِيۚ رَبَّنَا وَتَقَبَّلۡ دُعَآءِ
footnotes: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Niwezeshe nitimize Swala kwa inavyo takikana. Na wawezeshe watimilize kadhaalika wale walio wa kheri katika dhuriya zangu. Ewe Mola wetu Mlezi ipokee dua yangu kwa mapokezi ya kukubaliwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: rabbi ij'ʿalnī muqīma al-ṣalati wamin dhurriyyatī rabbanā wataqabbal duʿāi
